verses.content: Israelhai chu Aigupta rama inthawkin an suok a, Jakob sûnghai ngei chu ṭawng dang mihai laia inthawka an suok lai khan,
Judahai chu ama hmun inthieng an hung ni tah a, Israelhai chu a rorêlna ram an hung ni ta bawk a.
Tuisuoriet chun chu chu a hmuh a, a tlân hmang a, Jordan vadung chu sukkîrin a um tah a.
Tlâng lienhai chu berâmchalhai angin an inhnel a, Tlâng chînhai chu berâm chaltuoihai angin.
Aw nang tuisuoriet, ieng am i tih a, i tlân hmang a na? Nang Jordan, ieng am i tih a, i kîr nâwk a na?
Nangni tlâng lienhai, ieng am in tih a, berâmchalhai anga in inhnel a na? Nangni tlâng chînhai, ieng am in tih a, berâm chaltuoihai anga in inhnel a na?
Nang leihnuoi, LALPA hmaa chun inthin rawh, Jakobhai Pathien hmaa chun,
Ama chun lungpui chu dîlah ân changtir a, Meitâwklung chu tuihnârah ân changtir bawk a.
